page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: Secondary schools are for the eleven to eighteen year olds.They learn more practical work and get a wider variety of languages to learn. The day begins at eight forty and ends at three o'clock.The lunch break is usually shorter than in the middle schools.There are are more fter school activities and leisure clubs such as computer club,swimming club and hockey club.The building is larger and more complex as there are extra rooms such as metalwork rooms and cookery rooms. A university is run by the goverment and is usually for people who wish to either study a certain course and take exams. A polytechnic is un by the council and is aimed at young adults and offers courses in languages e.t.c.
